desc: The all new Infinity G26 Over Ear Wireless Headphone provides a superior sound experience. With powerful bass and Active Noise Cancelling, block out the distractions and only listen to what matters. Presenting sound without the BS.

layout.text: The All New Infinity G26 Wireless Over Ear Headphones
The stylish infinity G26 provides a superior listening experience in comfort. Enjoy the wireless benefits of Bluetooth 5.0 and listen with clarity with active noise cancellation.
